testsuite.name: 29 - I can rearrange the pipeline modal

testcase.name: 29 - I can rearrange the pipeline modal "before each" hook for "LM-29-3 Should close window"
testcase.classname: "before each" hook for "LM-29-3 Should close window"

failure.message:
Timed out retrying: cy.click() failed because this element is detached from the DOM.
<button data-v-04713248="" data-v-af6106c0="" class="pipeline-status-wrapper">...</button>
Cypress requires elements be attached in the DOM to interact with them.
The previous command that ran was:
> cy.contains()
This DOM element likely became detached somewhere between the previous and current command.
Common situations why this happens: - Your JS framework re-rendered asynchronously - Your app code reacted to an event firing and removed the element
You typically need to re-query for the element or add 'guards' which delay Cypress from running new commands.
https://on.cypress.io/element-has-detached-from-dom
Because this error occurred during a 'before each' hook we are skipping the remaining tests in the current suite: '29 - I can rearrange the pi...'
